title: MELVINS Announces Californian Tour Before NAPALM DEATH Dates
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
text: Melvins is about to have a busy 2025. Outside their massive trek with Napalm Death, Melvins has now announced a handful of Californian dates with CNTS and Desslok. The trek sees the Melvins touring as a four-piece with Dale Crover returning after a medical emergency sidelined him in 2023. Joining Crover behind the kit is Big Business' Coady Willis joining Crover for a rare double-drum extravaganza. Tickets are available here. 3/1 Bakersfield, CA The Nile Theater3/2 Fresno, CA Strummer's3/3 Sacramento, CA Goldfield Trading Post3/4 Santa Cruz, CA The Catalyst Atrium3/5 San Luis Obispo, CA SLO Brew Rock3/7 Pioneertown, CA Pappy & Harriet's Napalm Death and Melvins will hit the road in 2025 for the second installment of their Savage Imperial Death March tour. Additional support comes from Weedeater, Titan To Tachyons featuring Mr. Bungle's Trevor Dunn, and The Hard-Ons with Jerry A. Tickets are available here. html:
Melvins is about to have a busy 2025. Outside their massive trek with Napalm Death, Melvins has now announced a handful of Californian dates with CNTS and Desslok. The trek sees the Melvins touring as a four-piece with Dale Crover returning after a medical emergency sidelined him in 2023. Joining Crover behind the kit is Big Business' Coady Willis joining Crover for a rare double-drum extravaganza. Tickets are available here.

3/1 Bakersfield, CA The Nile Theater
3/2 Fresno, CA Strummer's
3/3 Sacramento, CA Goldfield Trading Post
3/4 Santa Cruz, CA The Catalyst Atrium
3/5 San Luis Obispo, CA SLO Brew Rock
3/7 Pioneertown, CA Pappy & Harriet's

Napalm Death and Melvins will hit the road in 2025 for the second installment of their Savage Imperial Death March tour. Additional support comes from Weedeater, Titan To Tachyons featuring Mr. Bungle's Trevor Dunn, and The Hard-Ons with Jerry A. Tickets are available here.
